Poliwhirl (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0060: Poliwag
Pokémon
#0062: Poliwrath →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Poliwhirl (TCG Pocket).

Poliwhirl has been featured on 18 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Poliwhirl cards are normally Water-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Poliwhirl

Poliwhirl
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
